meanings.definition: The state or quality of being naked or unclothed.
meanings.sent1: The nudeness of the baby made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: She felt embarrassed by the nudeness of her outfit.
meanings.sent3: The nudeness of the situation was unexpected but amusing.
meanings.sent4: His nudeness in front of the whole class was like standing in a spotlight.
meanings.sent5: The nudeness of the forest in winter was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: The nudeness of the tree branches made them vulnerable to the wind.
meanings.sent2: The nudeness of the truth was finally revealed.
meanings.sent3: The nudeness of the cake without frosting looked plain but inviting.
meanings.sent4: Her nudeness of emotions was like an open book for everyone to read.
meanings.sent5: The nudeness of the desert landscape was stark and beautiful.
